page.title: 14HOME COMPUTER USAGE
page.content:
Of the 222 pupils who had microcomputers the following numbers used computers for these purposes:-
{1.Games} 197 (89%) {2.Graphics } 40 (18%) {3.Education } 33 (14%) {4.Applications } 6 ( 3%) -------------------------------------- Types of{backing store media}used were: {1.Cassette tape}217 (98%) {2.Floppy disk} 5 ( 2%) {3.Cartridge tape }4 ( 2%) -------------------------------------- Of the full sample of 850, pupils who had {videotex }at home:- {Teletext}(CEEFAX,ORACLE etc) 50( 6%) {Viewdata}(PRESTEL) 3(0.4%) Number without videotex 797(93.6%) --------------------------------------
